message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR, cs.MM

The paper focuses on developing a new optical flow algorithm specifically for human motion analysis, which falls under computer vision (cs.CV). The authors also use a convolutional neural network to estimate human flow fields, which is a common technique in machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper involves synthesizing realistic flow fields using a 3D model of the human body and motion capture data, which could be considered artificial intelligence (cs.AI) or computer graphics (cs.GR). Finally, the authors mention the potential for mobile applications, which could fall under multimedia (cs.MM).
